title: The Simpsons Movie
content:
Since UnFleexable has either disappeared or committed suicide, I believe I'm the only one left to start a topic about this.

Anyways, has anyone seen it? I thought it was like a reasonably good, long episode. Nothing to write home about, but it never falters or anything.
